languages.text: "Я чувствовала, что анафема не разжала до конца когти, вцепившиеся в эти несчастные души. Так выйдем же навстречу ей и дадим отпор!"
"I knew the anathema would not fully release its hold on those doleful souls just yet. Then let us march and drive it away!"
languages.original_text: "Я чувствовала, что анафема не разжала до конца когти, вцепившиеся в эти несчастные души. Так выйдем же навстречу ей и дадим отпор!"

traits.locale_text: "I knew the anathema would not fully release its hold on those doleful souls just yet. Then let us march and drive it away!"
"I knew the anathema would not fully release its hold on those doleful souls just yet. Then let us march and drive it away!"
"I knew the anathema would not fully release its hold on those doleful souls just yet. Then let us march and drive it away!"
"I knew the anathema would not fully release its hold on those doleful souls just yet. Then let us march and drive it away!"
"I knew the anathema would not fully release its hold on those doleful souls just yet. Then let us march and drive it away!"

languages.text: 「アナテマは、あの悲しき魂を完全に解き放つことはないだろうと思っていました。ならば、進軍して追い払いましょう！」
languages.original_text: "I knew the anathema would not fully release its hold on those doleful souls just yet. Then let us march and drive it away!"

traits.locale_text: 「アナテマは、あの悲しき魂を完全に解き放つことはないだろうと思っていました。ならば、進軍して追い払いましょう！」

languages.text: “我就知道那些该死的邪教徒不肯放过那些饱受折磨的人们，我们立刻把他们消灭吧！”
languages.original_text: "I knew the anathema would not fully release its hold on those doleful souls just yet. Then let us march and drive it away!"

traits.locale_text: “我就知道那些该死的邪教徒不肯放过那些饱受折磨的人们，我们立刻把他们消灭吧！”

languages.text: « Je savais que l'anathème avait encore une emprise sur ces tristes âmes. Dans ce cas, nous devons nous en débarrasser ! »
languages.original_text: "I knew the anathema would not fully release its hold on those doleful souls just yet. Then let us march and drive it away!"

traits.locale_text: « Je savais que l'anathème avait encore une emprise sur ces tristes âmes. Dans ce cas, nous devons nous en débarrasser ! »

languages.text: «Sabía que el anatema no soltaría completamente a esas almas sufridas tan rápido. ¡Vamos pues, y expulsemos su poder!».
languages.original_text: "I knew the anathema would not fully release its hold on those doleful souls just yet. Then let us march and drive it away!"

traits.locale_text: «Sabía que el anatema no soltaría completamente a esas almas sufridas tan rápido. ¡Vamos pues, y expulsemos su poder!».

languages.text: "Ich wusste, das Anathema würde seinen Griff um diese traurigen Seelen noch nicht lockern. Also lasst uns marschieren, um es zu vertreiben!"
languages.original_text: "I knew the anathema would not fully release its hold on those doleful souls just yet. Then let us march and drive it away!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich wusste, das Anathema würde seinen Griff um diese traurigen Seelen noch nicht lockern. Also lasst uns marschieren, um es zu vertreiben!"

languages.text: "Lanetin bu kederli ruhların yakasını kolay kolay bırakmayacağını biliyordum. Harekete geçip onu kovalım!"
languages.original_text: "I knew the anathema would not fully release its hold on those doleful souls just yet. Then let us march and drive it away!"
